review.title: A Method for Determining Weights of Criterias and Alternative of Fuzzy Group Decision Making Problem
review.abstract: In this paper, we constructed a model to determine weights of criterias and presented a solution for determining the optimal alternative by using the constructed model and relationship analysis between criterias in fuzzy group decision-making problem with different forms of preference information of decision makers on criterias.
